about_the_game:
First Person Shouter is simple: destroy the things that frustrate you by yelling at your computer. Experience pure stress relief by reducing our carefully crafted worlds to rubble with the power of your voice.

Tend to your cat, Whiskers, in your cat cafe. Whiskers is a completely normal cat. There is nothing unusual about Whiskers  at all. He depends on you to gather the things that he needs from the world, and make sure that he stays safe and comfortable. If you do your job and Whiskers stays happy, then everything will be fine.

The things Whiskers needs are hidden inside of procedurally generated frustration simulations. By using our dynamic real-time destruction systems, you find the treasures hidden inside objects and put your own stamp on the virtual world.

  • Voice your Rage: capture your sound energy and transform it into explosive force. 

  • Procedural real-time destruction: Unique procedural destruction systems activate based on different ways of using your voice.

  • Randomized level assembly: the environment regrows in different ways each time you destroy it, creating a constantly shifting world to bend to your will.

  • Quiet mode: if you can’t just scream for whatever reason, you can play the game at lower volume levels or just use recorded shouts that play in your headphones.

  • Custom audio: use the in-game recording studio to add your own voice to the game
